title: kAmigaL AvOm vArIrE
sahitya:
kAmigaL AvOm vArIrE parama shivakAmigaL AvOm vArIrE


anupallavi

  nAmennum Anava mAyattai nalittE


caraNam 1    ADalAi ulagamellAm aruLinAl AkkinAn anbarai mEnmElum inbattil UkkinAn
vEDanAi viLaiyADi villaDiyum poruttAn vEda gAnattaik-kETTu vENDum varam aLittAn
    caraNam 2    mAdhava gauri tan pAdiyAgak-kUDinAn mArkaNDEyanaik-kAkka maraliyai sADinAn
pAdam vaittennuLLam paravashak-kUttADinAn pArthanukkup-pashupadam aLikka ODinAn
